EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi Vernice, Absolutely, I have sent you an updated calendar invite. Have a great day and I look forward to speaking with you on Thursday. Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
